experience.title: Software Intern
experience.address: RRCAT, Department of Atomic Energy (DAE), Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India
description: Developed a GUI-based MATLAB application for the identification of beam state for the INDUS-2 SRS particle accelerator (a national facility).
The application combines the concepts of the supervised & unsupervised learning approaches, and the data-mining principles, to gain insights by analyzing the historical data.

It programmatically accesses the beam-diagnostics data being logged onto the SRS2 data-servers in real-time, to perform classification based upon the results of the clustering analysis, to identify the current state of the particle accelerator.

The obtained results are graphically represented, along with the recently recorded observations, to facilitate rapid comparative analysis, along with the identification parameters for easy verification.
The developed application facilitates better diagnostics, to observe the feedback of the corrective beam alignment operations.
